scripts.cmake-configure: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path build-wasm)) { mkdir build-wasm }; cd build-wasm; C:\emsdk\emsdk.ps1 activate latest; emcmake cmake .. -G 'Unix Makefiles' "-DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=C:/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake" "-DVCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET=wasm32-emscripten""
scripts.cmake-build: powershell -Command "cd build-wasm; C:\emsdk\emsdk.ps1 activate latest; emmake make"
scripts.compile-wasm: npm run cmake-configure && npm run cmake-build
